department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 光學遙測原理、特性及應用簡介
goal.en: Introduction to the theory, specifics and applications of optical remote sensing

outline.ch: 1. 輻射的基本觀念; 2. 地球能量來源; 3. 大氣的吸收、發射及散射;4. 輻射傳送方程 ; 5. 遙測基本原理 ; 6. 遙測儀器與感測器 ;7. 遙測光譜波段與特色 ; 8. 衛星光學影像之簡介 ; 9. 遙測應用與未來展望。
outline.en: 1. Properties of Radiation; 2. Components of the Earth‘s Energy Budget; 3. Atmospheric Absorption, Emission, Scattering; 4. Radiative Transfer Equation (RTE); 5. Principle of Remote Sensing ; 6. Remote Sensing Instrument; 7. The Characteristics of Spectral Bands; 8. The Introduction of Satellite Imagery (optical); 9. Applications and Future Perspective.

textbook.ch:
1. Grant W. Petty：A First Course In Atmospheric Radiation. 2nd Edition, Sundog publishing, Madison Wisconsin, 2006.
2. Kuo-Nan Liou：An Introduction to Atmospheric Radiation. Academic Press, 1980.3. John R. Jensen: Remote Sensing of the Environment, Pearson, NJ, 2007.
